before_start: {"blocks":[{"key":"b1g9t","text":"Solution PW1 must be warmed at 55°C for 5–10 minutes to dissolve precipitates prior to use. ","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"aokhq","text":"Solution PW1 should be used while still warm.","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1qle","text":"Assume Solution PW3 has precipitated, and preemptively  heat at 55°C for 5–10 minutes to dissolve precipitate.","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8qn6d","text":"Shake to mix Solution PW4 before use.","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6thfm","text":"Perform all centrifugation steps at room temperature (15–25°C).","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

status.info: We use this protocol and it's working.  In the future, we would like to get an automated sampler, to reduce potential DNA contamination sources in the field, but this protocol works well when appropriate field negative controls are included in the analysis.

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"4aqh","text":"Collect water samples in a cleaned (see step 12) 1L Nalgene bottle by submerging the bottle and then opening it and closing it underwater. This step can be adapted to your sampling logistics, while reducing as much as possible any contact between your skin or clothes or other equipment with the water being sampled.  Label your samples, and take metadata including latitude and longitude  , water temperature, and any other variables you would like to have for later analysis.  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":49,"length":18}],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":389,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"cn38g","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"geographic","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"value":""}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"fr41n","text":"Discard the MB Spin Column, and place eluted liquid containing the eDNA into a new 1.5mL DNAse- , RNAse-free, sterile 1.5mL tube.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"e64kk","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"cl9re","text":"The DNA is now ready for downstream applications.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"equipment","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"brand":"Axygen","can_edit":1,"file":{"icon":"","id":null,"name":"","source":""},"guid":"E7FEF0F0862811EEBB730A58A9FEAC02","image":{"icon":"","id":null,"name":"","source":""},"link":"","name":"1.5mL sterile tubes","sku":"MCT150CS","specifications":"","type":"1.5 mL tube","vendor":{"id":350,"image":{"placeholder":"/img/vendors/placeholder.png","source":"/img/vendors/placeholder.png"},"is_requested":false,"link":"https://www.corning.com/worldwide/en/products/life-sciences/resources/brands/axygen-brand-products.html","name":"Axygen"}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"1mrr9","text":"QIAgen recommend storing DNA frozen (    to   ) as Solution EB does not contain EDTA","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":38,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":44,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"137d0","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"5EEAB0203DB011ECAD58F5735D928365","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"-90","unit":10}},"1":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"6BDE93503DB011ECAD58F5735D928365","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"-15","unit":10}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"4b8tr","text":"Assemble the reusable filter funnel with the 0.45 micron MCE filter inside it.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":45,"length":22}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"69ep","text":"Filter the water sample by pouring the contents of the    Nalgene bottle into the reusable filter unit, while applying a vacuum with the vacuum pump.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":137,"length":11}],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":55,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"1","error":false,"guid":"6E5A91DB865611EEBB730A58A9FEAC02","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":3}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"331l2","text":"Rinse 3x with purified water (drinking water if available, tap water if purified is not available or is cost prohibitive)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":6,"length":2}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7ckub","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"f1k5l","text":"After sample has been filtered, stop the vacuum and release the pressure by loosening the tubing to the reusable filter unit, then add 500uL of    to the filter so that the filter is covered by the buffer, let the buffer sit on the filter for at least   , then re-apply the vacuum again briefly, until the liquid has been pulled through the filter.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":144,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":252,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"8n7gs","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"reagents","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"can_edit":false,"cas_number":"","guid":"41AE57B8341F11EE9D4302C0B41BC903","linfor":"","mol_weight":0,"name":"DNA/RNA Shield","pubchem_id":"0","public":1,"rrid":"","sku":"R1100-50","stats":{"total_protocols":0},"url":"https://www.zymoresearch.com/collections/dna-rna-shield/products/dna-rna-shield","vendor":{"id":0,"image":{"placeholder":null,"source":"/img/vendors/placeholder.png"},"is_requested":false,"link":"http://www.zymoresearch.com/","name":"Zymo Research"}}},"1":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":5,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"lqla","text":"Remove the filter funnel portion of the reusable filter unit so that the filter is exposed.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"bgm75","text":"Wear lab gloves for all subsequent steps, and change your gloves if any contact with your sample water occurs, so you don't cross contaminate your samples during the filtration step.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"vlj","text":"for each subsequent liter of water to be processed,   ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":52,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"3n7la","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"gotostep","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"","id":0,"step_guid":"DBFC3A06861F11EEBB730A58A9FEAC02","title":""}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"7f87i","text":"Each time sampling logistics change, or rinse water availability changes, take a sample of 1L of rinse water and process according to this protocol, as a laboratory negative control.  Also, take a field negative control by leaving rinse water in one of the Nalgene bottles after cleaning and take it to the field with the rest of the bottles and handle the same as the sampling bottles, except don't change the water in the bottles, as a negative field control sample.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"73hv8","text":"Heat Solutions PW1 and PW3 to   and Buffer EB to   . ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":30,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":49,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"alj4m","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"55","unit":10}},"1":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"70","unit":10}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"5ct67","text":"Incubate at   for a minimum of   ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":12,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":31,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"9cue1","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"","unit":32}},"1":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":600,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"ctqti","text":"Store the sample bottles in a cooler    with icepacks to keep them cool and protected from UV light until they can be filtered (within 12 hours of collection).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":37,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"58469AF9865C11EEBB730A58A9FEAC02","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"","unit":165}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"7809k","text":"Clean the sample bottle (1L Nalgene bottle)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":25,"length":17}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"cm4k","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"d7tf","text":"with   and rinse 3x with purified water (drinking water if possible). ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":5,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"f95cg","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2ha60","text":"Take at least one negative control of the rinse water as described in step 13, in accordance with your sampling and processing logistics and budget.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"equipment","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"brand":"Nalgene","can_edit":1,"file":{"icon":"","id":null,"name":"","source":""},"guid":"6768E0D6862611EEBB730A58A9FEAC02","image":{"icon":"","id":null,"name":"","source":""},"link":"https://www.thermofisher.com/order/catalog/product/N311-1000BPC?SID=srch-srp-N311-1000BPC","name":"Wide-mouth HDPE bottle","sku":"N311-1000BPC","specifications":"","type":"sample collection bottle","vendor":{"id":9,"image":{"placeholder":"/img/vendors/placeholder.png","source":"/img/vendors/placeholder.png"},"is_requested":false,"link":"https://www.lifetechnologies.com","name":"Thermo Scientific"}}},"1":{"type":"reagents","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"can_edit":false,"cas_number":"","guid":"425354B5341F11EE9D4302C0B41BC903","linfor":"","mol_weight":0,"name":"10% Bleach","pubchem_id":"0","public":1,"rrid":"","sku":"","stats":{"total_protocols":0},"url":null,"vendor":{"id":0,"image":{"placeholder":null,"source":"/img/vendors/1.png"},"is_requested":false,"link":"https://www.protocols.io","name":"Contributed by users"}}}}}
